intro: Menyanthes brasilica, commonly known as Brazilian bog myrtle, is a perennial herbaceous plant native to South America. It belongs to the family Geraniaceae and is characterized by its low-growing, mat-forming habit. The plant produces small, white or pale yellow flowers that bloom in early spring.
